field.name: jf_ss_ID
field.label: Special ID
field.description: Type Module Special ID

field.name: jf_ss_type
field.label: Type
field.description: Choose which type slider you want. For example 'Testimonials' type has different design.

field.name: jf_ss_Swipe
field.label: Touch Swipe
field.description: Choose Enable or to Disable touchSwipe.

field.name: jf_ss_SwipeDevice
field.label: Touch Swipe - Device
field.description: Choose on which Device you want to use TouckSwipe function

field.name: jf_ss_Trans
field.label: Transition
field.description: Choose which transition you want

field.name: jf_ss_Auto
field.label: AutoPlay
field.description: Choose Enable or to Disable AutoPlay.

field.name: jf_ss_Interval
field.label: AutoPlay Interval
field.description: Type AutoPlay Interval in milliseconds (default is '5000').

field.name: jf_ss_Duration
field.label: Slide Duration
field.description: Type Slide Duration in milliseconds (default is '1500').

field.name: jf_ss_Easing
field.label: Animation Easing
field.description: Choose Animation Easing Effect.

field.name: jf_ss_Pause
field.label: Pause On Hover?
field.description: Choose Enable or to Disable to Pause On Hover.

field.name: jf_ss_Arrows
field.label: Arrows
field.description: Choose Enable or to Disable Arrow Buttons

field.name: jf_ss_Nav
field.label: Navigation
field.description: Choose Enable or to Disable Navigation Buttons

field.name: jf_ss_CSS3
field.label: CSS3 Animation
field.description: Choose Enable or Disable CSS3 Animations. 'Animate.css' option loads Stylesheet which is set in below field. 'Custom' Field loads stylesheet which is located in 'joomla_root/modules/mod_jf_simpleslider/assets/custom_css3.css'. (NOTE! - If you use our Joomla Template and if you use CSS3 Animations there, you dont need to Enable this feature here)

field.name: jf_ss_AnimateCSS
field.label: Animate.css Stylesheet
field.description: Type Animate.css stylesheet which you want to attach. (NOTE! - Make sure you have enabled 'Animate.css' option above)

field.name: jf_ss_AnimateFunc
field.label: Animate CSS Function
field.description: Choose Enable or to Disable Animate CSS Function - This feature enables 'data-animation' and 'data-animation-delay' attributes in slide captions. (NOTE! - If you use our Joomla Template and if you use CSS3 Animations there, you dont need to Enable this feature here)

field.name: jf_ss_styles
field.label: Custom CSS Styles
field.description: You can add your own custom CSS styles

field.name: jf_ss_slide_1
field.label: Slide #1
field.description: Choose Image.

field.name: jf_ss_slide_1_color
field.label: Slide #1 / Color
field.description: Choose Slide Color. This feature is useful if you dont want to use image as background. (NOTE! - For using it make sure you that you have not choosed image above in option)

field.name: jf_ss_slide_1_html
field.label: Slide #1 / Caption
field.description: You can type here caption HTML tags. Leave it Empty if you dont want to use it
